<a id="RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration"></a>

# RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Configuration object used to setup a [RenderSceneBuffers](RenderSceneBuffers.md) object.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This configuration object is created and populated by the render engine on a viewport change and used to (re)configure a [RenderSceneBuffers](RenderSceneBuffers.md) object.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

The requested scaling mode with which we upscale/downscale if [internal_size](RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration.md#RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration_property_internal_size) and [target_size](RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration.md#RenderSceneBuffersConfiguration_property_target_size) are not equal.
